p: The target compounds with the incorporated SF 5 group were successfully prepared starting from 2-fluoro-3-nitrobenzoic acid, which is commercially available and can be readily converted into the corresponding aniline 2 [ 22] . Benzoylation of 2 provided 3-benzamido-2-fluorobenzoic acid 3 in excellent yield [ 23]. Then, SF 5-containing compounds 4a– d were easily prepared by the condensation of benzoic acid 3 with 4-SF 5-anilines 1a– d ( Scheme 2) [ 24].
